name: Sarah Chen
tagline: Mojo Systems Architect | AI Kernel Hacker
bio: Specializing in extreme performance optimization for LLM inference engines. Formerly an HPC specialist, now building the decentralized compute layer for Antigravity.

name: Marcus Thorne
tagline: Prompt Security Auditor | Red Teaming AI
bio: Ensuring the integrity of the next intelligence layer. I break models to make them stronger. Focus on prompt injection mitigation and recursive output sanitization.

name: Aiko Sato
bio: Building the bridges between models and real-world APIs. Primary contributor to the Antigravity MCP Server Registry.

name: Liam O'Shea
bio: Infrastructure is code, and code is for agents. Automating the lifecycle of distributed intelligence clusters. Irish based, globally operational.

name: Rohan Deshmukh
bio: Specializing in LoRA/QLoRA efficiency. Turning massive models into agile tools for specific industry sectors. Based in Mumbai, syncing with the global core.

name: Elena Volkov
bio: Designing the interfaces that make AI feel human. Passionate about sleek dark modes, micro-interactions, and premium developer aesthetics.

name: Jordan Smith
bio: Developing self-correcting agent workflows. If it doesn't loop and learn, it isn't an agent. Contributor to various open-source agent frameworks.
